name: Bloody Gladiators
description:
Description

Bloody Gladiators is a blood-filled platformer game made for the Wowie Jam 3.0. Fulfil objectives by dying in spectacular and bloody ways - levels will be covered in blood after you're done! Complete all objectives to free the prisoner, and once he has been freed, kill him to make even more bloody mess! Complete objectives in the quickest amount of time and collect all coins to receive the best rating. Play through 10 unique levels and fill each one with as much blood as possible. How much gladiator blood can you spill?

Controls
  • Left mouse button - menu interaction
  • Left arrow key - move left
  • Right arrow key - move right
  • Up arrow key - climb up ladder
  • Down arrow key - climb down ladder
  • Z - jump
  • X - attack
Credits
  • Art by PixelSquad
  • Music by Nene
  • Sounds made with BFXR
